titleStmt.title: Articles to be inquired of vvithin the dioces of Ely in the first visitation of the R. Reverend Father in God Matthevv, Lord Bishop of Ely.
Visitation articles. 1638

notesStmt.note: Incorrectly identified as STC 10245 on reel 1350.

Reproductions of the originals in the Thomason Collection, British Library (Thomason Tracts and Early English books, 1641-1700) and in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.) Library (Early English books, 1475-1640).

Appears at (Early English books, 1475-1640) reels 1350 and 1413 (Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.) Library copy) and at (The Thomason Tracts and Early English books, 1641-1700) reels 41 and 265 (British Library copy).
